<|editable_region_start|>
  paste(readLines(prompt_file), collapse = "\n")

query_sonnet <- function(system_prompt, user_message) {
  chat <- chat_anthropic(
    system_prompt = system_prompt,
    model = "claude-3-7-sonnet-20250219",
    echo = "none"
  )
  chat$chat(user_message)
}
